item.title: Making a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @_Yummeh _Yummeh_
item.description:
@_Yummeh wrote:

I don’t need wilderness, I need a safezone.

At the moment, my whole server is wilderness.
Even if I make the

/*    public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
        if (Type == 1) {
            if ((absX >= 2000) && (absX <= 4000) && (absY >= 4500) && (absY <= 5500)) {
                return true;
            }
        } else if (Type == 2) {
        if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }*/

The server remains completely wilderness.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @_Yummeh _Yummeh_
item.description:
@_Yummeh wrote:

How would I stop the boolean closing before it decides?

Something like this?

    public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	}
        if (Type == 1) {
            if ((absX >= 2000) && (absX <= 4000) && (absY >= 4500) && (absY <= 5500)) {
                return true;
            }
        } else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

Read full topic

item.title: Making a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @_Yummeh _Yummeh_
item.description:
@_Yummeh wrote:

I’ve been trying to make a safezone for my server,
It’s not working, I’ve use loads of different combinations of co-ordinates,

Can someone help me?

I’d be happy if EVERYWHERE was a safezone for now, as wilderness is easy to make so it would seem.

My current code…

    public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	}
        if (Type == 1) {
            if ((absX >= 2000) && (absX <= 4000) && (absY >= 4500) && (absY <= 5500) || (absX >= 400) && (absX <= 2000) && (absY >= 5500) && (absY <= 4500)) {
                return true;
            }
        } else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

Read full topic
